title: [BUG] When deploying on Azure, error MSB4066: The attribute "Kind" in element <NativeReference> is unrecognized.
body:
**Description**
When deploying on Azure, WebApp, git deploy (windows machine), the following error shows up:

```
MSBuild auto-detection: using msbuild version '14.0'
packages\SkiaSharp.2.80.1\build\net462\SkiaSharp.targets(12,109): error MSB4066: The attribute "Kind" in element <NativeReference> is unrecognized.
```

This is the line.
```
<NativeReference Include="$(MSBuildThisFileDirectory)..\..\runtimes\osx\native\libSkiaSharp*.dylib" Kind="Dynamic" Visible="false" />
```

This is strange to happen on Azure?
Should I be setting the `ShouldIncludeNativeSkiaSharp` property to `false`?

Last person who changed this file is @mattleibow 

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.80.1
- Last known good version:  Never deployed before
- IDE:  Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks: My framework is 4.7.1. It uses the targets 4.6.2.
